text: Roger Kitter (20 October 1949 â€“ 3 January 2015) was a British actor. He was known for his role as 'Allo 'Allo!. In September 2009, he became Chairman of the Entertainment Artistes' Benevolent Fund. Kitter died from cancer in London of cancer of unknown primary origin at the age of 65. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from cancer of unknown primary origin Category:Cancer deaths in London Category:British movie actors Category:British television actors Category:British stage actors
